description:
Do you love playing the most addictive, challengeable and heart touching shooting games for testing your best shooting skills? If your answer is yes, then the Prison Break Survival Mission is just the perfect game for you right now. This game is not similar to many prison escape and shooting games, but this one comes with a new mind-blowing & prisoner escaping idea, a new gameplay and a new city and prison environment that will give you a thrilling experience while playing your best game. The mission of this game is to shoot and kill prisoners without letting them run or you will loose. But, keep in mind that there are many prisoners here and you should be very precise to kill them. Sounds easy for shooting all the prisoners, but can you really do it in each level to go to the following one?

Think about as an expert criminal in this game, you are in the prison jail, as prisoner and you required being deduction an arrangement on how you can escape from the jail. Now you want the plan, to break the guardhouse and turn out in this criminal life. All the tough time wasted in the jail, you need to pay attention in your ideal prison escape mission . Policemen are walking all over the prison, so you should be cautious while you will break the jail. Police are extremely harsh and dangerous to you and they make you sit on ice. Prison Police also employ to take out your nails for hurting you more and more. Presently you have this opportunity to get out from here so make a speedy move and break a Prison Bars by kicking and move out from here so you get the peacefull life.

You as a prisoner invested some punishments in this prison. Utilize kicks and secure yourself to battle with police, hitting on their head and body. You don't have any weapons to use aside from your energy. This Jail has a very strict security conditions and it is not a simple assignment to run from the jail. It is an extremely strengthening and exciting prison break game. Execute a complete escape plan to end this bullshit prison life.

Interesting & Easy:
We always care about you and your game playing interest, that's why we made our games very interesting and easy in playing. And the best & remarkable thing is that you don't have to learn or even watch the tutorial about how to play because it is very easy & much interesting! All that you have to do is to tap the zoom button, adjust the zoom and then tap shoot button.

Here are some tips to complete each level inside our game:
- Find your pace. It's likely that you will fail the level of the game a couple of times before you getting into the perfect shooting experience. So, we highly recommend you to focus on the clicking on screen and shooting experience right.
- Turn off notifications! Any distraction is a disaster and if you let any prisoner run, you will have to start the level again.

- Exciting 30 challenging levels
- perform real jail run and super fast game with smooth controls
- weapon to shoot them out
- the full action of complete prison escape story
- its free
- download and install!

Enjoy fun from this game which is full of adventure and action.
